paceCalcTextDescribe: Enter the target time of your run or race and select either Km or Miles. Enter the number of hours, minutes and seconds you are targeting as a finish time and press "Calculate pace". The pace that you need to run each kilometer or mile will be displayed.
finishTimeTextDescribe: Enter your pace per Km or Mile. Enter the race or run distance and press "Calculate finish time". The finish time will be displayed.

tooltips.averagePace: Calculated pace required to meet entered target time
